docs.abstract: Tagging photos with keywords allows you to quickly search for specific images based on what is shown in them.
docs.snippet: Tagging photos with keywords allows you to quickly search for specific images based on what is shown in them.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. I plan to start really organizing my digital photos on my computer. I would like to be able to sort them by location taken and search for pictures based on who or what is in the photo. Are there photo-editing programs that can also catalog a large personal picture collection?

docs.abstract: The website’s efforts to police misinformation have become more visible since the school shooting in Parkland, Fla., last month.
docs.snippet: The website’s efforts to police misinformation have become more visible since the school shooting in Parkland, Fla., last month.
docs.lead_paragraph: YouTube this week cracked down on the videos of some prominent far-right actors and conspiracy theorists, continuing an effort that has become more visible since the school shooting in Parkland, Fla., last month caused a torrent of misinformation to be featured prominently on the site.

headline.main: YouTube Cracks Down on Far-Right Videos as Conspiracy Theories Spread

docs.abstract: If you want to browse international sites but cannot understand the text, a number of software interpreters will translate for you.
docs.snippet: If you want to browse international sites but cannot understand the text, a number of software interpreters will translate for you.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. I know there are sites that convert words and phrases from other languages to English, but how do you translate an entire web page?

docs.abstract: The virtual assistant software for Android devices retains a few of the old Google on Tap shortcuts.
docs.snippet: The virtual assistant software for Android devices retains a few of the old Google on Tap shortcuts.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. My Android tablet recently got the Google Assistant update, but I find I miss pressing the Home button to get the little box that used to pop up with the search icons for more information about people and places on the Chrome page I was reading. Now I just get the Google Assistant asking if I want help. Is there a way to get the old feature back?

docs.abstract: If a tvOS app stops working on your Apple TV, you can force it to quit without having to reboot the set-top box.
docs.snippet: If a tvOS app stops working on your Apple TV, you can force it to quit without having to reboot the set-top box.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. I have one app on my fourth-generation Apple TV that freezes every once in a while, and the only way I can get out of it is to unplug the whole Apple TV box. Is there an easier way to get back to the home screen?

headline.main: Thawing a Frozen Apple TV App
headline.print_headline: How to Unstick A Frozen Apple TV

docs.abstract: If you’re still receiving “Welcome back to Facebook” messages, you may not have fully closed your account on the social network.
docs.snippet: If you’re still receiving “Welcome back to Facebook” messages, you may not have fully closed your account on the social network.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. Last year I opened a Facebook account, and as I entered my information I soon decided I didn’t want to continue. I deleted the app on my phone and tablet. Occasionally, I receive a “Welcome back to Facebook” message and realize I’ve not cut the cord. Is there way to sever this connection for good? Completely?

headline.main: You Dumped Facebook. So Why Does It Keep Sending You Emails?

docs.abstract: Those lightweight laptops running Google’s Chrome OS operating system can work with certain types of printer models.
docs.snippet: Those lightweight laptops running Google’s Chrome OS operating system can work with certain types of printer models.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. How do you print from a Google Chromebook?

headline.print_headline: Setting Up to Print From Chromebook

docs.abstract: Twitter will stop supporting its official app for Mac computers in mid-March, but you can find alternatives that offer plenty of features.
docs.snippet: Twitter will stop supporting its official app for Mac computers in mid-March, but you can find alternatives that offer plenty of features.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. When is the Twitter desktop app for Mac going away, and what are the alternatives if I don’t want to keep the web version open on a browser all day?

headline.main: How to Get Your Tweet Fix Now That Twitter’s Mac App Is Dead

docs.abstract: The computer has so many features that are more fun than doing homework, but parents have controls to restrict games, screen time and more.
docs.snippet: The computer has so many features that are more fun than doing homework, but parents have controls to restrict games, screen time and more.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. Can Windows 10 track how much time a child spends playing games?

headline.main: Tools to Keep Your Children in Line When They’re Online

docs.abstract: The president said the United States would announce a “reciprocal tax” on unfair trading partners, but one White House adviser said nothing had been formalized.
docs.snippet: The president said the United States would announce a “reciprocal tax” on unfair trading partners, but one White House adviser said nothing had been formalized.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — President Trump said on Monday that the United States would soon announce a “reciprocal tax” on countries that take advantage of the United States on trade, including trading partners he described as “so-called allies.”

headline.main: Trump Threatens New Trade Penalties, but It Could Be a Hard Bargain
headline.print_headline: Trump Threatens Allies With a ‘Reciprocal Tax’
